alert.note: Alert for Espanola Valley; Estancia Valley; Northwest Plateau; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; Santa Fe Metro Area; South Central Highlands; West Central Highlands (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 14 at 11:43AM MDT until July 14 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Temperatures between 99 and 103 expected. * WHERE...Estancia Valley, San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands, South Central Highlands, Espanola Valley, Santa Fe Metro Area, Northwest Plateau, and West Central Highlands. * WHEN...Until 8 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Take extra precautions when outside. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Take action when you see symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke.

area.areaDesc: Espanola Valley; Estancia Valley; Northwest Plateau; San Agustin Plains and Adjacent Lowlands; Santa Fe Metro Area; South Central Highlands; West Central Highlands
